2.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dThrows a fiery arrow that inflicts !e1 damage.
2.name: Firebolt
2.title: Firebolt

4.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dChannels a stream of ice that inflicts !e1 damage per second and applies an Ice Flow effect that decreases movement speed by 75% for !e2 seconds.
When Ice Flow fades, a Deep Frost effect is applied instead that inflicts additional !e3 Frost damage when the target receives direct Fire damage.
If the target dies, cooldown of this ability resets.
4.name: Ice_Flow
4.title: Ice Flow

6.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 damage.
Inflicts 100% more damage if the target's health is below 25%.
6.name: Shocking_Grasp
6.title: Shocking Grasp

7.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 instant Fire damage and engulf the target in flames that inflict !e2 damage every 2 seconds for 6 seconds.
Requires 2 Fire Force points.
7.name: Fire_Shock
7.title: Fire Shock

8.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dA stream of ice that inflicts !e1 damage.
8.name: Frostbolt
8.title: Frostbolt

9.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSurrounds you with !e1 charges that absorb !e2 physical damage each.
In combat, Stone Barrier can be cast again only in 45 seconds after the last charge is consumed.
Stone Barrier cancels the "Elemental Shield" or "Stone Wall" effect.
Stone Barrier and "Stone Wall" share a cooldown.
9.name: Stone_Barrier
9.title: Stone Barrier

10.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dHoming missile that inflicts !e1 Frost damage.
Can be used even if your line of sight to the target is blocked by an obstacle.
Requires 2 Frost Force points.
10.name: Icy_Comet
10.title: Icy Comet

12.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSurrounds you with !e1 magical charges that absorb !e2 direct Fire, Frost, Lightning, Acid, Holy, Shadow, or Astral damage each.
In combat, Elemental Shield can be cast again only in 45 seconds after the last charge is consumed.
Elemental Shield cancels the "Stone Barrier" or "Stone Wall" effect.
12.name: Elemental_Shield
12.title: Elemental Shield

13.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 damage to all enemies within a 10 yard radius
13.name: Meteor
13.title: Meteor

14.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dTeleports you !e1 yards forward.
Any obstacle in your way will interrupt your movement.
14.name: Flash
14.title: Flash

15.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSets up a wall of flame at the chosen location for 20 seconds.
Upon entering the wall, enemy turns into panic and receives !e1 damage every second for 6 seconds.
This damage generates 300% additional threat.
When the panic effect fades, the enemy becomes immune to it for 30 seconds.
After the spell is cast, the wall takes 2 seconds to flame up.
Requires 1 Fire Force point.
15.name: Fire_Wall
15.title: Fire Wall

16.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dStuns the target with an avalanche of ice for !e1 seconds, making them unable to move or use abilities.
Removes all Fire effects from the target.
Any damage dealt to the target will cancel the effect.
Can be applied to a single target only.
16.name: Icy_Grave
16.title: Icy Grave

17.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dCreates !e1 illusions of you that last 15 seconds.
Incoming attacks have a chance to be redirected to an illusion and dissipate it.
This ability can be used under most of the effects which prevent casting spells.
17.name: Reflections
17.title: Reflections

18.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dIncreases maximum health, mana and energy of all party members by !e1%You cannot use Seal of Health and "Aura of Astral Power "at the same time
18.name: Seal_of_Health
18.title: Seal of Health

19.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dEvery second a discharge is sent to the target inflicting !e1 damage.
Lasts 5 seconds.
Requires 2 Lightning Force points.
19.name: Electric_Pulse
19.title: Electric Pulse

20.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dAttempt to remove one useful magical effect from an enemy target.
20.name: Dispel
20.title: Dispel

21.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 damage to all enemies within a 10 yard radius.
Requires 2 Fire Force points.
21.name: Flaming_Meteor
21.title: Flaming Meteor

22.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dHoming missile that inflicts !e1 Frost damage.
Can be used even if your line of sight to the target is blocked by an obstacle.
Requires 3 Frost Force points.
22.name: Icy_Meteor
22.title: Icy Meteor

23.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dEvery second lightning strikes the target and up to 3 enemies within a 10 yard radius of the target, inflicting !e1 damage to each enemy.
Lasts 5 seconds.
Requires 3 Lightning Force points.
23.name: Thunderhead
23.title: Thunderhead

24.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSurrounds you with !e1 charges that absorb !e2 physical damage each.
In combat, Stone Wall can be cast again only in 45 seconds after the last charge is consumed.
Stone Wall cancels the "Elemental Shield" or "Stone Barrier" effect.
"Stone Barrier" and Stone Wall share a cooldown.
24.name: Stone_Wall
24.title: Stone Wall

25.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dEnchants the space between the caster and the target during 8 seconds.
After casting is interrupted or finished, the spell deals !e1 damage per second of cast time to the target and other enemies within 10 yards.
If the cast time exceeds 4 seconds, the targets will be knocked down for 2 seconds.
*Consumes 2 Tears of Dragon.*
Using Tears of Dragon of a higher quality increases the damage.
25.name: Elemental_Surge
25.title: Elemental Surge

26.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dApplies an effect that prevents interruption of spell casting when receiving damage, moving or jumping.
Duration: 12 seconds.
*Consumes 5 Tears of Dragon.*
Duration of the effect is increased if Tears of Dragon of a higher quality are used.
26.name: Magic_Tactics
26.title: Magic Tactics

27.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dEngulfs the target in flames that inflict 28.
2 damage per second for 5 seconds and periodically causes the target to flee in terror, making them unable to move or use abilities.
Requires 1 Fire Force point.
27.name: Conflagrate
27.title: Conflagrate

30.body:
!lvl !cost !dYour "Fire Wall" damage has a !e1% chance to grant you a Pyromania effect decreasing cast time of your "Firebolt" and "Fire Shock" spells by 100%.
This effect stacks up to 3 times.
30.name: Pyromania
30.title: Pyromania

31.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases cast time and mana cost of your Fire Bolt, "Meteor" and "Flaming "Meteor"" spells by !e1%.
31.name: Eruption
31.title: Eruption

32.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases periodic damage of your "Fire Shock" and "Conflagrate" spells by !e1%.
32.name: Endless_Flames
32.title: Endless Flames

33.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases your Conviction by !e1% and grants a !e2% chance that your Fire damage spell casts will not be interrupted by damage.
33.name: Stoic_Soul
33.title: Stoic Soul

34.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases damage of your "Meteor" and "Flaming "Meteor"" by !e1%, but if they miss you will receive !e2 to !e3 damage instead.
34.name: Playing_with_Fire
34.title: Playing with Fire

35.body:
!lvl !cost !dDuring the Fire cycle, you receive a Fiery Gehenna effect every 5 seconds at a !e1% chance.
This effect decreases cast time and mana cost of your "Firebolt" by 50%, lasts 30 seconds and stacks up to 5 times.
Only active in combat.
35.name: Fiery_Gehenna
35.title: Fiery Gehenna

36.body:
!lvl !cost !dIf you keep running for !e1 seconds, you receive a "Pyromania" effect decreasing cast time of your "Firebolt" and "Fire Shock" spells by !e2%.
This effect stacks up to three times and can only be acquired in combat.
36.name: Blazing_Speed
36.title: Blazing Speed

37.body:
!lvl !cost !dIncreases direct damage of your "Fire Shock" spell by !e1%.
In addition, damage over time effect of this spell will decrease movement speed by !e2%.
37.name: Incinerating_Strike
37.title: Incinerating Strike

38.body: !lvl !cost !dYour direct damage Fire spells apply an effect that blocks !e1 healing.
38.name: Burnout
38.title: Burnout

39.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases cooldowns of your "Stone Barrier" and "Stone Wall" by !e1 seconds.
39.name: Concrete_Mind
39.title: Concrete Mind

40.body: !lvl !cost !dGrants you a !e1% chance to build up one additional Fire Force point and one additional Lightning Force point during each Elemental Cycle, but you will stop building up Frost Force points.
40.name: War_of_the_Elements:_Fiery_Lightning
40.title: War of the Elements: Fiery Lightning

41.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSummons an invisible trap beneath the caster.
When an enemy enter approach it closer than 10 yards, it explodes, inflicting 164 damage to all surrounding enemies.
Only 1 trap can be active at a time.
Lasts 2 minutes.
41.name: Fire_Trap
41.title: Fire Trap

42.body: !lvl !cost !dGrants you a !e1% chance to build up one additional Frost Force point and one additional Fire Force point during each Elemental Cycle, but you will stop building up Lightning Force points.
42.name: War_of_the_Elements:_Burning_Ice
42.title: War of the Elements: Burning Ice

44.body: !lvl !cost !dGrants you a !e1% chance to build up one additional Lightning Force point and one additional Frost Force point during each Elemental Cycle, but you will stop building up Fire Force points.
44.name: War_of_the_Elements:_Icy_Lightning
44.title: War of the Elements: Icy Lightning

46.body:
!lvl !cost !dYour "Icy Comet" and "Icy "Meteor"" have a !e1% chance to cast an additional "Icy Comet" at the same target.
This additional "Icy Comet" has a very little chance of resulting in a critical strike or glancing blow.
46.name: Hailstorm
46.title: Hailstorm

47.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dFreezes all enemies within a 10 yard radius, making them unable to move for 10 seconds.
Any direct damage has a 50% chance to dispel this effect.
Requires 1 Frost Force point.
47.name: Chains_of_Ice
47.title: Chains of Ice

48.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases cooldown of "Ice Flow", "Icy Comet" and "Icy "Meteor"" spells by !e1%, and their mana cost by !e2%.
48.name: Icy_Avalanche
48.title: Icy Avalanche

49.body:
!lvl !cost !dYour "Icy Comet" and "Icy "Meteor"" spells additionally apply a Hoarfrost effect that lasts 10 seconds.
Hoarfrost effect decreases movement speed by !e1% and inflicts !e2 damage at the end of the duration or upon dispelling.
49.name: Hoarfrost
49.title: Hoarfrost

50.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases cast time, cooldowns and mana cost of "Ice Flow", "Snowstorm" and "Icy Grave" abilities by !e1%.
50.name: Sleet
50.title: Sleet

51.body:
!lvl !cost !dGrants your "Icy Grave" spell a !e1% chance to freeze a second target within 10 yards of the main target.
In addition, all Frost damage you deal is increased by !e2%.
51.name: Ice_Tomb
51.title: Ice Tomb

52.body:
!lvl !cost !dIncreases non-critical damage of your "Frostbolt", "Icy Comet", "Icy "Meteor"" and "Snowstorm" spells by !e1%.
In addition, there is a !e2% chance that damaging a target will not dispel the "Icy Grave" effect if the target has more than 90% health.
52.name: Frosty_Advantage
52.title: Frosty Advantage

53.body:
!lvl !cost !dDuring the Frost cycle, you receive a Northern Lights effect every 6 seconds at a !e1% chance.
This effect decreases cast time and mana cost of your "Frostbolt" by 50%, lasts 30 seconds and stacks up to 5 times.
Only active in combat.
53.name: Northern_Lights
53.title: Northern Lights

55.body:
!lvl !cost !dIncreases duration of your "Reflections" by !e1 second and grants you one additional charge of this effect.
In addition, each time a charge is consumed, you restore !e2 mana.
55.name: Snow_Dam
55.title: Snow Dam

56.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSummons a storm that inflicts 51.
4 damage every 2 seconds to all enemies in the area.
56.name: Snowstorm
56.title: Snowstorm

57.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dAn appeal to Astral powers that grants you 2 to 3 Force points of each element.
May be used only if you have less than 2 Force points of each element.
57.name: Elemental_Wrath
57.title: Elemental Wrath

58.body: !lvl !cost !dEach subsequent charge of "Electric Pulse" or "Thunderhead" inflicts !e1% more damage than the previous charge.
58.name: Cascade
58.title: Cascade

59.body: !lvl !cost !dAt the start of each Elemental Cycle that allows you to build up Lightning Force points, you receive a Lightning Jolt effect that increases range of your next "Shocking Grasp" by !e1% and its damage by !e2%.
59.name: Lightning_Jolt
59.title: Lightning Jolt

60.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dDecreases the effectiveness of your healing spells by 50%.
Spells you cast increase magic damage done by your party members by !e1%Cast this spell again to remove this effect
60.name: Aura_of_Astral_Power_
60.title: Aura of Astral Power

62.body:
!lvl !cost !dYour spells that spend Lightning Force points grant you a Corona Discharge effect that inflicts !e1 damage to the next enemy who attacks you with a direct damage ability.
This effect stacks up to 5 times.
62.name: Corona_Discharge
62.title: Corona Discharge

63.body:
!lvl !cost !dEach Lightning spell you cast applies a weak Static Charge effect to the target that deals !e1 damage every 2 seconds.
This effect stacks up to 10 times, but any movement dispels it.
63.name: Static_Charge
63.title: Static Charge

64.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases damage of your Lightning Grasp spell by !e1% against targets who have less than 25% health.
64.name: Lethal_Shock
64.title: Lethal Shock

65.body: !lvl !cost !dYour "Flash" spell additionally grants you !e1 charge of the Reflection effect and decreases your threat by an amount equal to !e2 of inflicted damage.
65.name: Breakdown
65.title: Breakdown

66.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases cast time and mana cost of your "Electric Pulse" and "Thunderhead" spells by !e1%.
66.name: Dynamo_Effect
66.title: Dynamo Effect

67.body:
!lvl !cost !dDuring the Lightning cycle, you receive a Thundering Advantage effect every 6 seconds at a !e1% chance.
This effect decreases cast time and mana cost of your "Thunderbolt" by 50%, lasts 30 seconds and stacks up to 5 times.
Only active in combat.
67.name: Thundering_Advantage
67.title: Thundering Advantage

68.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases critical strike damage of your Lightning spells by !e1% and decreases cooldown of your "Elemental Shield" spell by !e2 seconds.
68.name: Positive_Feedback
68.title: Positive Feedback

70.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dChannels electric energy into a prism and unleashes it to inflict 102 damage to the target and up to 3 enemies within a 7 yard radius of the target.
70.name: Prismatic_Lightning
70.title: Prismatic Lightning

72.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dChannels electric energy into a prism and unleashes it to inflict 102 damage to the target and up to 3 enemies within a 7 yard radius of the target.
72.name: Hardened_in_Flames
72.title: Hardened in Flames

73.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dChannels electric energy into a prism and unleashes it to inflict 102 damage to the target and up to 3 enemies within a 7 yard radius of the target.
73.name: Portal
73.title: Portal
